Concerns:
- Page 1: History of present illness notes patient was found wandering about in a store with trespassing order against her and was aggressive in the emergency room and threatening to kill the staff.
- Page 2: Mental status notes patient was showing manic-like behavior, pressured speech, poor boundaries. Ability to concentrate was distractible. Speech was tangential and loud.
- Page 5: No significant living situation or occupation listed.
- Page 7: Psychiatric evaluation notes patient came from ER where she made verbal threats toward staff and threatened to leave facility, was agitated and required PRN medication including Ativan and Zyprexa IM.
- Page 10: H&P notes patient is homeless. 
- Page 11: Shift narrative notes patient has been medication compliant with no complaints but has been responding to internal stimuli.
- Page 13: Shift narrative notes patient has been anxious, delusional, having frequent requests, labile, paranoid and restless.
- Page 15: Shift narrative notes patient was isolative, guarded, no group attendance, easily irritable, given PRN meds, monitored for acute distress and untoward behavior.
